name: Liar Liar (Zuckman)
description:
Little Timmy is sick of things going bump in the night, and has decided to take them head on.

With help from your friend Ellie and your trusty torch, ward off the monsters for as long as you can.

Ellie will tell you where they are, but beware, Ellie is known to be a liar.
